Quick post inspired by the winning / nearly there / need action graphs by @yaneerbaryam at https://www.endcoronavirus.org/countries.

# Data  

Health regions date is compiled by Isha Berry & friends [github](https://github.com/ishaberry/Covid19Canada).
Montreal boroughs data is [published daily](https://santemontreal.qc.ca/population/coronavirus-covid-19/).  They only keep the total and keep no history, so @bouchecl visits them every day and compiles the data in this [google sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1mOyyeCHwfI_F_T3pAalIdMBxhhfTbM7m5RvbciXIvPM/)  

# Code   

As usual, the code [for this post is on github](https://github.com/SimonCoulombe/snippets/blob/master/content/post/2020-05-10-covid19-cases-in-canadian-health-regions-with-over-1000-cumulative-cases.Rmd).  

New to me : the new tidyeval that uses {{ }}, and using vars() inside facet_wrap to allow tidyevaluation.

New to me : using aws.s3 to share images.

library(tidyverse)
library(googlesheets4)
mortality_hr <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ishaberry/Covid19Canada/master/timeseries_hr/mortality_timeseries_hr.csv") %>%
  rename(date_report = date_death_report )%>%
  mutate(date_report = lubridate::dmy(date_report))%>%
  filter(health_region != "Not Reported") %>%
  mutate(health_region = case_when(
    health_region == "Gaspésie-Îles-de-la-Madeleine" ~ "Gaspésie", 
    health_region == "Abitibi-Témiscamingue" ~ "Abitibi",
    health_region == "Terres-Cries-de-la-Baie-James" ~ "Terre-Cries",
    TRUE ~ health_region)
  )  %>%
  mutate(pr_region = paste0(province,"-", health_region)  )


cases_timeseries_hr <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ishaberry/Covid19Canada/master/timeseries_hr/cases_timeseries_hr.csv") %>%
  mutate(date_report = lubridate::dmy(date_report))%>%
  filter(health_region != "Not Reported") %>%
  mutate(health_region = case_when(
    health_region == "Gaspésie-Îles-de-la-Madeleine" ~ "Gaspésie", 
    health_region == "Abitibi-Témiscamingue" ~ "Abitibi",
    health_region == "Terres-Cries-de-la-Baie-James" ~ "Terre-Cries",
    TRUE ~ health_region)
  )  %>%
  mutate(pr_region = paste0(province,"-", health_region)  )




prep_data <- function(data, group, type){
  
  type_column <- enquo(type)   ## this has to be !!
  type_name <- quo_name(type_column) ## its a string, dont !!
  mean_name = paste0("avg_", type_name, "_last7")   
  mean_column <- sym(mean_name)
  gaa <-   data %>% 
    group_by( {{ group }} ) %>%
    arrange(date_report) %>% 
    mutate(!!mean_name := ( !!type_column + lag(!!type_column, 1) + lag(!!type_column, 2) + lag(!!type_column, 3) + lag(!!type_column, 4) + lag(!!type_column, 5) + lag(!!type_column, 6)) / 7)  %>%
    ungroup() 
  
  gaa1 <- gaa %>%
    group_by( {{ group }}) %>%
    summarise(total = sum(!!type_column),
              worst7 = max(!!mean_column, na.rm = TRUE),
              last7  = max(!!mean_column * (date_report == max(date_report)), na.rm = TRUE),
              ratio = last7 / worst7,
              winning = factor( 
                case_when(ratio < 0.33 ~ "Winning",
                          ratio < 0.67 ~ "Nearly there",
                          TRUE ~ "Needs action"
                )
                , levels = c("Winning", "Nearly there", "Needs action"))
    ) %>%
    ungroup() %>%
    
    mutate(
      group = fct_reorder( {{ group }}, total, .desc =TRUE)
    )
  
  
  
  gaa %>% 
    left_join(gaa1) 
  
  
 
}


create_graph <- function(data, filter_exp, title, geo,mindate= "20200315", type){
  type_column <- enquo(type)
  type_name <- quo_name(type_column)
  mean_name = paste0("avg_", type_name, "_last7")  # its a string, dont !! it
  mean_column <- sym(mean_name)
  
  

  labels <- data %>%
    filter( {{ filter_exp }} ) %>%
    group_by( {{ geo }} )%>%
    summarise(label = paste0( format(sum( !!type_column ),
                                     digits=9,
                                     decimal.mark=",",
                                     big.mark=" ",
                                     small.mark=".",
                                     small.interval=3),
                              " total " ,
                              type_name),
              value =  0.9 *  max(!!mean_column, na.rm = TRUE)

    ) %>%
    mutate(key=!!mean_name,
           date_report = lubridate::ymd(mindate)+1
    )

  last_value_label_data <-
    data %>%
    filter( {{ filter_exp }} ) %>%
    group_by( {{ geo }} )%>%
    filter(date_report == max(date_report)) %>%
    mutate(key=!!mean_name,
           label = paste0(round(!!mean_column)),
           value = !!mean_column) %>%
    ungroup()

  data  %>%
    filter( {{ filter_exp }}  & date_report >= lubridate::ymd(mindate)) %>%
    gather(key=key, value= value,  !!mean_column) %>% #cases,
    mutate(alpha = if_else(key == !!type_column, 0.5, 1)) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x=date_report, y= value, group = key))+
    facet_wrap( vars ({{ geo }}),  scales = "free", labeller = label_wrap_gen(width=25) )+
    geom_line(aes( color = winning, alpha = key), size =1) + # linetype = key,
    dviz.supp::theme_dviz_grid()+
    scale_y_continuous(breaks = scales::pretty_breaks(n =3) )+
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 30, hjust = 1, vjust = 1)) +
    scale_colour_manual(values = c("darkgreen", "darkorange", "darkred"),
                        name = paste0("(# of ", type_name," last week) / (# of ", type_name, " worst week):"),
                        labels= c("< 0.33", "0.33 to 0.67", " > 0.67"))  + # ,guide = "none"
    scale_alpha_manual(values = c(1, 0.3), labels= c("7-day average", "Daily count"),name =  "type:" )+ #  name = NULL , guide = "none"
    labs(
      title = title,
      subtitle = paste0("As of ", format(lastdate, format="%B %d %Y")),
      caption = "Graph by @coulsim, data by @ishaberry2 & @jpsoucy https://github.com/ishaberry/Covid19Canada"
    ) +
    xlab("date")+
    ylab ( paste0("Daily new ", type_name)) +
    theme(legend.position="bottom") +
    geom_text(data= labels ,
              aes(label = label),
              hjust = "left" ) +
    expand_limits(y = 0) +
    ggrepel::geom_text_repel(
      data = last_value_label_data,
      aes(
        label = label
      )
    ) +
    theme(strip.text.x = element_text(angle = 0, hjust = 0))

}




get_province_graph <- function(.prov){
  
  z <- cases %>% 
    filter(province == .prov) %>%
    mutate(health_region = fct_reorder(health_region, total, .desc =TRUE))
  
  g <- create_graph(z,
               TRUE,
               paste0("Daily new Covid-19 cases by health regions in ", .prov),
               health_region,
               type = cases)
  myggsave(filename = paste0("~/git/adhoc_prive/covid19_PNG/", .prov, "_cases.png"))
  
  z <- deaths %>% 
    filter(province == .prov) %>%
    mutate(health_region = fct_reorder(health_region, total, .desc =TRUE))
  
  g <- create_graph(z,
               TRUE,
               paste0("Daily new Covid-19 deaths by health regions in ", .prov),
               health_region,
               type = deaths)
  myggsave(filename = paste0("~/git/adhoc_prive/covid19_PNG/", .prov, "_deaths.png"))
  
  
    
  
}


get_rss_graph <- function(.rss, .mindate){
  
  z <- rls_cases %>% 
    filter(RSS == .rss) %>%
    mutate(RLS = fct_reorder(RLS, total, .desc =TRUE))
  
  g <- create_graph(z,
               TRUE,
               paste0("Daily new Covid-19 cases by RLS in ", .rss),
               RLS,
               mindate = .mindate,
               type = cases)+
    labs(caption = "graph by @coulsim, data compiled by @bouchecl from https://www.inspq.qc.ca/covid-19/donnees/details/ ") 
  
  myggsave(filename = paste0("~/git/adhoc_prive/covid19_PNG/", .rss, "_cases.png"))
}


myggsave <- function(filename = default_name(plot), plot = last_plot(),
                     height= 9, width= 12, dpi= 250, ...) {
  ggsave(filename=filename, plot,  height=height, width=width, dpi=dpi, ...)
}

lastdate  <- max(cases$date_report)

g <- create_graph(cases, 
             total > 1000 , 
             "Daily new Covid-19 cases in health regions with cumulative cases over 1000",
             group, 
             type = cases)

myggsave(filename = "~/git/adhoc_prive/covid19_PNG/canada_cases.png")

## deaths
deaths <- prep_data(mortality_hr, pr_region, type = deaths )  

lastdate  <- max(deaths$date_report)

g <- create_graph(deaths, 
             total > 100 , 
             "Daily new Covid-19 deaths in health regions with cumulative deaths over 100",
             group, 
             type = deaths)

myggsave(filename = "~/git/adhoc_prive/covid19_PNG/canada_deaths.png")

# generate provinces
map(unique(cases$province), ~get_province_graph(.prov = .x))




# mtl  ----
url_mtl_arrondissement <- "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1mOyyeCHwfI_F_T3pAalIdMBxhhfTbM7m5RvbciXIvPM/"
gs4_deauth()
prout <- read_sheet(url_mtl_arrondissement)

mtl  <- prout[1:which(prout$Quartier == "Westmount"), ] %>% 
  gather(key=key, value=cumulative_cases, -Quartier) %>%
  mutate(cumulative_cases = map_int(cumulative_cases, ~ as.integer(str_replace_all(.x, " ", "")))) %>% # remove spaces from numbers
  mutate(date_report = lubridate::dmy(paste0(str_replace_all(str_replace_all(str_replace_all(str_replace_all(key," mars","03"), " avr.", "04"), " mai", "05"), "jui", "06"), 2020))) %>%
  select(-key) %>%
  group_by(Quartier) %>% 
  arrange(Quartier, desc(date_report)) %>% ## descending date to fix cumulative 
  mutate(cumulative_cases = if_else(cumulative_cases > lag(cumulative_cases), lag(cumulative_cases), cumulative_cases, cumulative_cases)) %>% ## cumulative can't be bigger than next day.. if so reduce to next day level.
  arrange(Quartier, date_report) %>% ## ascending date
  mutate(cases = cumulative_cases - lag(cumulative_cases)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>%
  filter(!is.na(cases)) 


mtl_cases <- prep_data(mtl, Quartier, type = cases)
lastdate  <- max(mtl_cases$date_report)
g <- create_graph(mtl_cases , 
             total> 200,
             "Daily new Covid-19 cases for Montreal boroughs with more than 200 cases", 
             group,
             mindate="20200405", 
             type = cases) +
  labs(caption = "graph by @coulsim, data compiled by @bouchecl from https://santemontreal.qc.ca/population/coronavirus-covid-19/ ")

myggsave(  filename = "~/git/adhoc_prive/covid19_PNG/mtl_above_200_cases.png")


g <- create_graph(mtl_cases , 
             total <= 200,
             "Daily new Covid-19 cases for Montreal boroughs with less than 200 cases", 
             group,
             mindate="20200405", 
             type = cases) +
  labs(caption = "graph by @coulsim, data compiled by @bouchecl from https://santemontreal.qc.ca/population/coronavirus-covid-19/")


myggsave(  filename = "~/git/adhoc_prive/covid19_PNG/mtl_below_200_cases.png")


# rls ----
url_rls <- "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/17eJ05pg6fkzKlwwiWn0ztdMvzBX9pGx3q6w7h3_vJw4/"
gs4_deauth()
prout <- read_sheet(url_rls)

rls  <- prout[1:which(prout$NoRLS == 1801), ] %>% 
  filter(!is.na(NoRLS)) %>% 
  select(-No,  -NoRLS,  -Population)%>% 
  gather(key=key, value=cumulative_cases, -RLS, -RSS) %>%
  mutate_at( vars(cumulative_cases) , as.numeric) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(cumulative_cases)) %>%
  #filter(NoRLS == "0112") %>%
  mutate(cumulative_cases = map_int(cumulative_cases, ~ as.integer(str_replace_all(.x, " ", "")))) %>% # remove spaces from numbers
  mutate(date_report = lubridate::ymd(key)) %>% 
  select(-key) %>%
  group_by(RSS,RLS) %>% 
  arrange( RSS,RLS, desc(date_report)) %>% ## descending date to fix cumulative 
  mutate(cumulative_cases = if_else(cumulative_cases > cummin(cumulative_cases), cummin(cumulative_cases), cumulative_cases, cumulative_cases)) %>% ## cumulative can't be bigger than next day.. if so reduce to next day level.
  arrange( RSS,RLS, date_report) %>% ## ascending date
  mutate(slope = (lead(cumulative_cases)- cumulative_cases) / as.numeric(lead(date_report) - date_report)) %>%
  complete(date_report = seq.Date(min(date_report), max(date_report), by = "day")) %>%
  fill(slope, .direction= "down") %>%
  mutate(cumulative_cases = floor(first(cumulative_cases) + cumsum(slope))) %>%   
  select(-slope) %>%
  mutate(cases = cumulative_cases - lag(cumulative_cases)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>%
  filter(!is.na(cases))%>%
  mutate(shortname_rls = str_replace(str_extract(str_replace(RLS, "RLS de ","RLS " ),"RLS.+"),"RLS ", ""))


rls_cases <- prep_data(rls, shortname_rls, type = cases)
firstdate <- min(rls_cases$date_report)
lastdate  <- max(rls_cases$date_report)
g <- create_graph(rls_cases , 
             total> 100 & RSS != "06 - Montréal",
             paste0("Daily new Covid-19 cases for RLS outside Montréal with more than 100 cases since ", firstdate), 
             group,
             mindate= firstdate,
             type = cases) +
  labs(caption = "graph by @coulsim, data compiled by @bouchecl from https://www.inspq.qc.ca/covid-19/donnees/details/ ") 


myggsave(filename = "~/git/adhoc_prive/covid19_PNG/rls_above_100_cases.png")


firstdate <- min(rls_cases$date_report)
lastdate  <- max(rls_cases$date_report)
map(unique(rls_cases$RSS), ~get_rss_graph(.rss = .x, .mindate = firstdate))
